Ext.menu.Item Example

DOWNLOAD

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.1.0
  • Ext.menu.Item
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.menu.Item Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.menu.Menu', {
        width: 100,
        height: 100,
        floating: false,
        // usually you want this set to True (default)
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
        // usually rendered by it's containing component
        items: [{
            text: 'icon item',
            iconCls: 'add16'
        }, {
            text: 'text item'
        }, {
            text: 'plain item',
            plain: true
        }]
    });
});
